User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the Campus Connect platform.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user entity.

email.description: The email address of the user.

registrationDate.description: The date and time the user registered.

avatarDataUrl.description: A base64-encoded data URI of the user's custom avatar image.

Item.title: Item
Item.description: Represents a lost or found item reported on the platform.

id.description: Unique identifier for the lost item entity.

userId.description: Reference to the User who reported the item. (Relationship: User 1:N Item)

category.description: The category of the item (e.g., Electronics, Books).

description.description: A detailed description of the item.

date.description: The date when the item was lost/found.

location.description: The location where the item was lost/found (e.g., Library, Cafeteria).

imageUri.description: URI of the image associated with the item.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the item was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the item was last updated.

participants.description: An array containing the UIDs of the two participants in the conversation.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Represents a message exchanged between users about a specific item.

id.description: Unique identifier for the message entity.

senderId.description: The UID of the user who sent the message.

senderName.description: The display name of the user who sent the message.

senderAvatarUrl.description: The avatar URL of the user who sent the message.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the message was sent.

isFirstMessage.description: Indicates if this is the first message in the conversation.

/items/{itemId}.description: Stores all lost and found items.

/items/{itemId}/messages/{messageId}.description: Stores messages related to a specific item.
